text: Hugh Hewitt (born February 22, 1956) is an American radio talk show host. He works with the Salem Radio Network. He is also a lawyer, academic, and author. Hewitt is a conservative and a Catholic, he comments on society, politics, and media bias in the United States. Hewitt is also a law professor at Chapman University School of Law. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Hewitt's columns at Townhall.com * * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:American radio personalities Category:Lawyers from Ohio Category:Educators from California Category:Writers from Ohio Category:Writers from California Category:People from Orange County, California Category:American bloggers Category:Lawyers from California Category:Educators from Ohio
title: Hugh Hewitt
